title: BPMN+
description: This is the BPMN+ stencil set specification.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the Diagram.

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: This holds the name of the language in which text is written.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.

properties.title: TargetNamespace
properties.description: The modeler must add the target namespace for the participant topology.

properties.title: GroundingFile
properties.description: The modeler may add a reference to the grounding file for the choreography.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: MessageExchanges
properties.description: A whitespace separated list of message exchange names.

properties.title: Selects
properties.description: All participant references and sets that are selected from the participant represented by this pool (separated with comma).

properties.title: BoundaryVisible
properties.description: Defines if the rectangular boundary for the Pool is visible.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: MessageExchanges
properties.description: A white space separated list of message exchange names.

properties.title: BoundaryVisible
properties.description: Defines if the rectangular boundary for the pool set is visible.

stencils.title: Service Task
stencils.description: An task that invokes an activity of another pool or pool set.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: The Type of Acitivity.

properties.title: Status
properties.description: The Status of an activity is determined when the activity is being executed by a process engine.

properties.title: St_LoopConditionLanguage
properties.description: A language may be provided so that the syntax of the loop condition can be understood.

properties.title: TaskType
properties.description: The Type of Task.

stencils.title: Receive Task
stencils.description: An task that receives a message from an activity of another pool or pool set.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: The Type of Acitivity.

properties.title: Status
properties.description: The Status of an activity is determined when the activity is being executed by a process engine.

properties.title: St_LoopConditionLanguage
properties.description: A language may be provided so that the syntax of the loop condition can be understood.

properties.title: TaskType
properties.description: The Type of Task.

stencils.description: An task that sends a message.

properties.title: Status

properties.title: St_LoopConditionLanguage
properties.description: A language may be provided so that the syntax of the loop condition can be understood.

properties.title: TaskType
properties.description: The Type of Task.

stencils.description: An task that copies data from one variable to another.

properties.title: TaskType
properties.description: The type of Task.

stencils.title: Event-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway
stencils.description: A exclusive decision point based on events.

properties.title: Scope
properties.description: The id of the scope, the variable data object is limited to.

properties.title: DefinitionTypePrefix
properties.description: Prefix of the namespace the value below is defined in. The prefix must be associated with a namespace in the Imports attribute of the pool or pool set.

properties.title: DefinitionTypeValue
properties.description: Name of an wsdl message, xml schema type or xml schema element defined for the namespace with the prefix above.

properties.title: DefinitionTypePrefix
properties.description: Prefix of the namespace the value below is defined in. The prefix must be associated with a namespace in the Imports attribute of the pool or pool set.

properties.title: DefinitionTypeValue
properties.description: Name of an wsdl message or xml schema element defined for the namespace with the prefix above.

properties.title: DefinitionTypePrefix
properties.description: Prefix of the namespace the value below is defined in. The prefix must be associated with a namespace in the Imports attribute of the pool or pool set.

properties.title: DefinitionTypeValue
properties.description: Name of an wsdl message or xml schema element defined for the namespace with the prefix above.

properties.title: Selects
properties.description: A whitespace separated list of participant names.

properties.title: CopyTo
properties.description: The name of another reference to copy this reference to.

properties.title: Scope
properties.description: The id of the scope that limits the context of the reference.

properties.title: CopyTo
properties.description: The name of another set to copy this set to.

properties.title: Scope
properties.description: The id of the scope that limits the context of the set.

stencils.title: Message Start Event
stencils.description: A message event without incoming edges.

properties.title: MessageExchange
properties.description: The message exchange name to disambiguate the relationship between this event and the following send tasks.

properties.title: Correlations
properties.description: This attribute is used to identify a conversation.

stencils.title: Timer Start Event
stencils.description: A timer event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Message Event
stencils.description: An intermediate message event with incoming and outgoing edges.

properties.title: MessageExchange
properties.description: The message exchange name to disambiguate the relationship between this event and the following send tasks.

stencils.title: Timer Event
stencils.description: An intermediate timer event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Error Event
stencils.description: An intermediate error event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Compensation Event
stencils.description: An intermediate compensation event with incoming and outgoing edges.

properties.title: Activity
properties.description: The id of the scope or task to compensate.

stencils.title: Termination Event
stencils.description: An intermediate termination event with outgoing edges.
